Articles.Content:
If I go on steam and click play on KSP or click the icon on my desktop it just say "preparing to launch KSP" and the screen will just stay there and do nothing. When I go into the ksp files and open KSP form there it opens. I don't think I can submit a log here because its not launching.

Mods used

Real Plume

Smokescreen

Better Burn time

Asteroid day

Stock clamshell fairing

Stock fairing tweaker

 

Edited February 9, 2016 by Dfthu
This is an issue with Steam not KSP.  You need to take it up with Steam tech support.
